back-end.request-without-parameters: Requests without parameters are not supported
back-end.only-one-host-allowed:
Only one (default) host is allowed.
Configure `SQL_MULTIHOST` and `SQL_DEFAULT_HOST` constants differently if needed.
back-end.import-server-limits:
File or text must be smaller than every of the following limits:
%s
back-end.data-overflow:
The requested data cannot be displayed: the amount of memory it takes will cause SQLantern breakage.
To avoid this error:
- select less rows (overflow happened on row %s)
- select less columns
- uncheck "Full texts" (if checked)
back-end.joomla-access-denied:
ACCESS DENIED

Make sure that everything below is true:

  • You are logged-in into Joomla! right now (Joomla! recognizes you as a user, your session is not over).
  • The SQLantern plugin is installed and enabled.
  • The user you are logged-in as belongs to the user group, which is set as having access to the SQLantern plugin.
  • Your Joomla! uses MariaDB or MySQL database system ("Database Type" is "MySQLi" or "MySQL (PDO)").
  • Your Joomla! stores sessions in the database ("Session Handler" is "Database").

If all of the above is true, do the following to continue working in this browser tab:

  • Leave this tab open.
  • Open a new SQLantern tab from the Joomla! Administrator.
  • Close that new tab, continue working in this tab.
back-end.opencart-access-denied:
ACCESS DENIED

Please, check that everything below is true:

  • You are logged-in into OpenCart Dashboard right now (OpenCart recognizes you as an admin, your session is not over).
  • The SQLantern module is installed and enabled.
  • The user you are logged-in as belongs to the user group, which has "modify" access to the SQLantern module.
  • Your OpenCart uses MariaDB or MySQL database system (`DB_DRIVER` is "mysqli").
  • Your OpenCart stores sessions in the database or uses PHP native sessions (`session_engine` is "db" or is not set).

If all of the above is true, do the following to continue working in this browser tab:

  • Leave this tab open.
  • Open a new SQLantern tab from the OpenCart Dashboard.
  • Close that new tab, continue working in this tab.

data-hint.refresh-panel: Refresh databases Refresh tables Refresh structure and indexes
data-hint.keep-alive:
Keep this connection alive
(usually prolongs short-lived sessions)
data-hint.auto-height:
Enlarge and shrink the query input height
together with the height of the query itself

data-text.export-text-mysqli:
STORED PROCEDUREs are not exported.
CREATE DATABASE and USE DATABASE are not exported.
If you choose to export structure, tables are recreated (`DROP TABLE IF EXISTS`, then `CREATE TABLE`).
data-text.export-text-pgsql:
STORED PROCEDUREs are not exported.
CREATE DATABASE and USE DATABASE are not exported.
If you choose to export structure, tables are recreated (`DROP TABLE IF EXISTS`, then `CREATE TABLE`).
Material Views data is not exported, only structure.
data-text.import-text-mysqli:
Beware: Foreign keys check is always disabled during import.
If you need foreign keys check, add the following line above all other SQL commands in your imported file or text:
`SET SESSION foreign_key_checks = '1';`

js.login-info:
`user` to connect to default host via default port

`user@example.com` to connect to non-default host (must be enabled) via default port

`user@localhost:33309` to connect via non-default port (host must be explicitly used, even if connecting to default host)
js.profiler-info:
One or multiple queries can be profiled (use the "Add" button).

Queries in the list are run and measured sequentially (not in parallel, not simultaneously), one by one, from top to bottom, endlessly, until "Stop" is pressed.

Queries can be left in the list and ignored at the same time, not being run and measured ("Skip").

Internal duration is displayed, which the database system measures inside itself, network latency is not taken into account.
js.settings-extra-hints-info:
Display hints:

- about settings,

- about login (hosts and ports),

- about profiling
js.settings-auto-colour-info:
Auto colour databases (random colour)

(Will not change already open panels)

(Will not change already open panels)

(Will not change already open panels)
js.settings-export-rows-info:
The quantity of rows to break export by

(Will not change already open panels)
js.settings-profiler-time-info:
Default pause between requests in profiling

(Will not change time in already open profiling)
js.settings-distinct-info:
Use `{table}` for table name
`{field}` for field name
